title: worldofcoins
author: worldofcoins
created_time: December 31, 2022, 07:54:31 PMLast edit: June 14, 2023, 12:28:24 PM by worldofcoins
content: Satoshi Auction Signature CampaignWebsite | ANN ThreadCampaign Rules- Minimum 20 Posts per week- Posts made in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, Bounty Threads, and where the signature is not displayed will not count towards the minimum- Posts should be 150 characters minimum. Low-quality posts will not be counted.- Enrolling with Alt Account(s) is forbidden.- You cannot Enroll if you've valid negative (-ve) Tags/Flags against you by any DT-1, DT-2 Member(s).- Max of 4 Posts/Day will be counted (Forum's Time)- Minimum 5 posts in the gambling section per week- Minimum of 5 Earned Merit in the past 120 days are required to participate in the campaign.- After acceptance (Avatar, Signature & Personal Text) must be worn within 24 hours.- Removing/Changing the signature while in the Campaign will result in disqualification, and you will have to re-apply if you want to join again.- I reserve the right to kick you out for any valid misconduct done by you and deny the payment.- Conballer reserves the right to stop this campaign at any time.- Another week will not start unless I announce. Once started will be paid without any Delay.Week starts on Sunday @ 0:00 and ends on Saturday (Forum Time) @ 23:59 PM. Payment is processed within 12 - 48 hours after a week has ended. Pay rates for Ranks3x Sr. Member: 0.0012 BTC/WeekApplication formCode:Username:Profile-Link:BTC Address:Post-Count:Merits Earned (Last
